talent.title: Spirit of Omen's Awakening: Pyro Scorpion

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> , summons 1 <color=#ffffff>Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) <color=#ffffff>After this character takes DMG:</color> If this character has no greater than 7 HP, they gain 1 <color=#ffffff>Energy</color> . (Once per Match)

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>
<color=#ffffff>When entering play, when the Action Phase starts:</color> Equips Pyro Scorpion: Guardian Stance to your Eremite Scorching Loremaster. (When Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion is in play, the character will take -1 DMG, once per Round.)

Applies Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Energy</color>
Characters must consume Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.
When characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 Energy.

value.name: Eremite Scorching Loremaster
value.desc:
A person hailing from the loosely-organized mercenary bands of the desert. Even though they will work for anyone as long as the pay is good, they will never forget their roots in the Great Red Sand.
After the collapse of its civilizations, the stories of the desert were passed down generation after generation in oral tradition just like the sparks in the wind and the rain in the clouds. As time passed, some stories were lost while others survived, albeit with significant changes.
"The Eremites" is the umbrella term given to the tribes of the desert by those too ignorant or disdainful to learn the tribes' myriad differences. Within those referred to as the Eremites, many have also indeed already forgotten the tales of the desert. Fear not, however, for those who still remember will never betray the spirit of the sands yet flowing through their veins.
